## Mixin() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Mixin<T1, C1, T2, C2, T3, C3, T4, C4>(m1: C1 & Cls<T1>, m2: C2 & Cls<T2>, m3: C3 & Cls<T3>, m4: C4 & Cls<T4>): Ctor<T1 & T2 & T3 & T4> & C1 & C2 & C3 & C4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m1 | C1 &amp; Cls&lt;T1&gt; |  |
|  m2 | C2 &amp; Cls&lt;T2&gt; |  |
|  m3 | C3 &amp; Cls&lt;T3&gt; |  |
|  m4 | C4 &amp; Cls&lt;T4&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
